Html:
Hi,

First of all: great control! Keep up the good work.

I'm trying to use it in a WPF application and I have an outer <Border> with rounded corners around the GMap.

Is it possible, that the GMap cuts its corners to fit into the rounded border corners?

The ClipToBounds = true property does not work :(

Best regards,

Robert

Hi,

what do you mean?

Here you can see the problem I have with Gmap + Border with rounded corners:

The Gmap doesn't clip it's edges to the rounded ones from my outer border.

Any idea how to get this to work?

Thank you,

Robert
does it even possible to do this with some other controls?
